org.forgerock.http.handler

Interface DescribableHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Describable<io.swagger.models.Swagger,Request>, Handler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DescribedOauth2Endpoint, Router

    public interface DescribableHandler
extends Handler, Describable<io.swagger.models.Swagger,Request>
    A handler that both handles Requests, and also supports querying for API Descriptors.
    See Also:
    Handler, Describable
